content.rendered:
Black Oak is a business we started & still own

Black Oak Mountain Vineyards

Black Oak is a luxury destination wedding venue near Sacramento, California. 

Hidden in the hills of a place aptly named, Cool. 

Not only did we create this business & brand from the ground up, but we still own and operate it today. 

At MTHD we don’t just say we can do it for you – we’ve proved we can do it for you, because we’ve done it for ourselves multiple times.

visit website

Edge of the world views

This mountain modern estate was completely renovated by us. 

Before we arrived, it was just a house and 150 acres of untamed fields. 

But now, after applying our method, it’s an in-demand destination wedding venue with wine-producing vines. 

We gave to the land – and the land now gives back to us. 

From logos to landscaping, we designed and executed it

Even producing our own wines

Black Oak isn’t just a breathtaking venue, it’s an experience, where guests can taste the literal fruits of our labor in the form of delicious, home-grown Californian wines. 

Made in intimate batches, our winemakers blend of Killer Bees & Pantera wines always sell out. 

One sip, two sip, three sip... more.

The Numbers don't lie...

From 0 to Over 3 Million Dollars in just 2 years
$ 0 +

In just a few years of ownership, we’ve turned Black Oak from a financial liability, into a profitable asset that pays for itself (and then some). 

From the positioning, to the logo, to the email copy, to the wine labels & beyond – we did it, using our method. 

Couples are captured by the look of Black Oak – but they sign the contracts based on the ‘feel’ that we’ve created around it… That’s the power of effective branding. 

but why not more?

You may be thinking if it’s this good, “why haven’t you made more money?”

The answer is simple, we could – but California has regulations & restrictions on the number of events allowed, that we need to overcome. 

This is in progress and we hope to run far more events when these county restrictions are lifted. 

Then, we can scale the business to the horizon – and that value will shoot up. 

The transformation

from farmyard to fabulous

nature's karma

We leave space for nature at our venue and in return the bees pollinate our crops & produce delicious, organic honey to share with us. 

Jars of this wildflower honey are sold & even given to our clients as gifts. 

The brand we created screams organic, untouched & unprocessed. It captures the invisible voice of Black Oak. They say you can’t bottle a ‘vibe’ but our honey proves them wrong.

Want to see how we can help your brand now?

book a call
